name: nillebco.github.io
description: - [obsolete] synchronize notion posts (./cli sync)   - export the post (Markdown/CSV)   - generate a slug from the file name - write the blog post markdown in blog/post - add a record in the posts.json file - run generate_rss.py (./cli rss) - create a new BlueSky post, get the post ID (./cli tweet slug) - update posts.json with the bskyId

scripts.build: npm run build:blog && npm run build:portfolio
scripts.dev: npm run build && echo 'Build complete. Run again to rebuild.'
